duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop business acumen and leadership skills by actively participating in and completing all development activities.
Collaborate and network with teammates to form lasting professional connections.
Complete projects or assignments that assist the department and support Truist goals.
Help solve day-to-day projects and work on assignments. Receive classroom and on-the-job training.
Network with senior executives and associates to form lasting professional connections.
Shape and accelerate your career path within the Technology group and Truist.

education_certification.credential: Working towards the completion of a BA/BS or advanced degree program at an accredited college or university. (Technical Majors preferred: Computer Science/Engineering, Cybersecurity, Innovation, Computer Information Systems, Management Information Systems, Graphic Design, Interaction Design, User Experience, Industrial Design, Architecture, Human Factors, Human-Computer Interaction or related field etc.)
